course_title: Special Topics in Curriculum and Pedagogy - SP TPCS C&P

301.comments: EDCP 467J Curriculum and Pedagogy in Junior Science: Grades 8-10This course focuses on teaching and learning in the junior science classroom that follows a hands-on Inquiry approach.This section will be offered online.
